mainPages.title: Original Games
mainPages.description: Original games created by CAFFE students.

mainPages.title: Vampire Survivors
mainPages.description: CAFFE students' played and studied Vampire Survivors by Poncle Games. They made their own versions of the game using Microsoft MakeCode Arcade.

mainPages.title: Games Made in 10 Minutes
mainPages.description: Can you make a game in just 10 minutes? Out students tried. They were given a random setting and game mechanic, then they had just 10 minutes to make a whole game.

mainPages.title: Stealth Games
mainPages.description: Stealth games are games where you try to sneak around and avoid being seen. Can you get through these mazes without being spotted by an enemy?
